verses.verse: In the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius, <S%H1867><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> was very <S%H7110><s%> angry <S%H7107><s%> with your fathers.

"Therefore say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "Return <S%H7725><s%> to Me," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "that I may return <S%H7725><s%> to you," says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

"Do not be like your fathers, to whom <S%H1><s%> the former <S%H834><s%> prophets <S%H7223><s%> proclaimed, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H7121><s%> 'Thus <S%H559><s%> says <S%H3541><s%> the Lord <S%H559><s%> of hosts, <S%H3068><s%> "Return <S%H6635><s%> now <S%H7725><s%> from your evil <S%H4994><s%> ways <S%H7451><s%> and from your evil <S%H1870><s%> deeds. <S%H7451><s%>"' But they did not listen <S%H4611><s%> or give <S%H8085><s%> heed <S%H7181><s%> to Me," declares <S%H7181><s%> the Lord. <S%H5002><s%>
"Your fathers, where <S%H1><s%> are they? And the prophets, <S%H346><s%> do they live <S%H5030><s%> forever <S%H2421><s%>?

"But did not My words <S%H1697><s%> and My statutes, <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> My servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> overtake <S%H5381><s%> your fathers? Then they repented <S%H1><s%> and said, <S%H7725><s%> 'As the Lord <S%H559><s%> of hosts <S%H3068><s%> purposed <S%H6635><s%> to do <S%H2161><s%> to us in accordance with our ways <S%H6213><s%> and our deeds, <S%H1870><s%> so <S%H4611><s%> He has dealt <S%H3651><s%> with us.'"' "

On the twenty-fourth day <S%H3117><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the month <S%H2320><s%> Shebat, <S%H7627><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius, <S%H1867><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo, <S%H5714><s%> as follows: <S%H559><s%>

I saw <S%H7200><s%> at night, <S%H3915><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> was riding <S%H7392><s%> on a red <S%H122><s%> horse, <S%H5483><s%> and he was standing <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the myrtle <S%H1918><s%> trees <S%H1918><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in the ravine, <S%H4699><s%> with red, <S%H122><s%> sorrel, <S%H8320><s%> and white <S%H3836><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> him.

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "My lord, <S%H113><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> are these <S%H428><s%>?" And the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> to me, "I will show <S%H7200><s%> you what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are."

And the man <S%H376><s%> who was standing <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the myrtle <S%H1918><s%> trees <S%H1918><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "These <S%H428><s%> are those whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> to patrol <S%H1980><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

So they answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who was standing <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the myrtle <S%H1918><s%> trees, <S%H1918><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "We have patrolled <S%H1980><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is peaceful <S%H3427><s%> and quiet. <S%H8252><s%>"

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> how <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> wilt Thou have <S%H7355><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> for Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast been <S%H2194><s%> indignant <S%H2194><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>?"

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me with gracious <S%H2896><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> comforting <S%H5150><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>

So the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Proclaim, <S%H7121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%>" I am exceedingly <S%H1419><s%> jealous <S%H7065><s%> for Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

"But I am very <S%H1419><s%> <S%H7110><s%> angry <S%H7107><s%> with the nations <S%H1471><s%> who are at ease; <S%H7600><s%> for while I was only a little <S%H4592><s%> angry, <S%H7107><s%> they furthered <S%H5826><s%> the disaster. <S%H9567><s%>"

'Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "I will return <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with compassion; <S%H7356><s%> My house <S%H1004><s%> will be built <S%H1129><s%> in it," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "and a measuring <S%H6957><s%> line <S%H6957><s%> will be stretched <S%H5186><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>"'

"Again, <S%H5750><s%> proclaim, <S%H7121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "My cities <S%H5892><s%> will again <S%H5750><s%> overflow <S%H9446><s%> with prosperity, <S%H9185><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will again <S%H5750><s%> comfort <S%H5162><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> and again <S%H5750><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> "'"
Then I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there were] four <S%H702><s%> horns. <S%H7161><s%>

So I said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me, "What <S%H4100><s%> are these <S%H428><s%>?" And he answered <S%H559><s%> me, "These <S%H428><s%> are the horns <S%H7161><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>"
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H7200><s%> me four <S%H702><s%> craftsmen. <S%H2796><s%>

And I said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> coming <S%H935><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%>?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "These <S%H428><s%> are the horns <S%H7161><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> so <S%H6310><s%> that no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> lifts <S%H5375><s%> up his head; <S%H7218><s%> but these <S%H428><s%> [craftsmen] have come <S%H935><s%> to terrify <S%H2729><s%> them, to throw <S%H3034><s%> down <S%H3034><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> who have lifted <S%H5375><s%> up [their] horns <S%H7161><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> in order to scatter <S%H2219><s%> it."
